title: I've said it before and I'll say it again.. I miss the old champion select music
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jO5jOv_BkNg

It had a melody, it had power, it had.. epicness. I wish they'd bring it back somehow, or just let us pick which one we want to hear. I loaded it up while in champ select and.. the memories, guys.. the memories..

T_T
